title: Welcome to the Kanium Discord!
description: Please ensure to have a look at our #public_info channel and understand who we are and how this place works.
Additionally it must be mentioned that being on our Discord and playing games with us, does not require Kanium membership. We,
on the other hand, expect that those who seek to apply for membership show earnestness- in both application and in becoming part of the community

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Use this to submit an application for joining Kanium

fields.name: Enjoy your stay
fields.value: Feel free to hang out in the chat rooms. If you're looking to play a specific game, join that game's chat channel

footer.text: If you have any questions, please ping a @Recruiter
